DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effect caffeine supplement stimulation lipolysis production ketone healthy adult ( N=10 ) . Two different dos caffeine ( 2.5 mg/kg BW 5 mg/kg BW ) compare . All participant follow three sequential visit four hour , include breakfast one dose ( 2.5 5 mg/kg ) caffeine supplement without supplement ( baseline ) repeat blood sample order evaluate ketone concentration .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult 18 year old Drinking 300 mg caffeine per day Diabetes prediabetes Abnormal liver kidney function Uncontrolled dyslipidemia , blood pressure Use drug know influence metabolism lipid carbohydrate ( steroid , betablockers , diuretic , insulin sensitizer , etc . ) Severe inflammation infection Pregnancy Smoking
